channel.title: Alerts Feed
channel.description: Alerts Feeds -- Los Angeles Fire Department

item.description: KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0882; 12:36PM; 3943 S Dalton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v11r9H; Exposition Park; KNOCKDOWN: 28 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes. The adult male patient is being transported to the hospital in unknown condition. No further details.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 EM11 RA25 RA29 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0882; 12:23PM; 3943 S Dalton Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3v11r9H; Exposition Park; One story, single family dwelling with fire showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode. There are no other buildings exposed. There is one (male) patient being assessed in unknown condition.; FS 46; Batt 13; South Bureau; Council District 8; BC11 BC13 E15 E215 E226 E26 E34 E46 RA29 RA834 SQ21 T15 T26; CH9; 12; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#1008; 02:28PM; 3472 E 1st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GJTFUf; Boyle Heights; KNOCKDOWN: Over 60 firefighters extinguished the fire in 45 minutes with no injuries reported. The building type is updated to an approximately 40' x 60' one story, pre-1933 commercial building. LA Building and Safety is responding to determine whether the building is safe for the business to occupy. No further details.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E201 E202 E203 E209 E211 E3 E4 E447 E458 E9 E95 EA1 EM1 HR3 RA35 RA844 SO1 SQ95 T1 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR3 UR88; CH9; 13 14; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#1008; 01:43PM; 3470 E 1st St; MAP: https://bit.ly/41m9Nou; Boyle Heights; Row of commercial buildings with heavy smoke showing in one unit (additional units exposed). Two more task forces requested and are enroute. Goldline requested to be shut down due to proximity to the operations.; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC11 E202 E4 E447 E458 RA35 RA844 T2 T9; CH9; 13; Margaret Stewart

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0423; 08:44AM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; KNOCKDOWN: 44 firefighters extinguished the fire in 13 minutes with no injuries reported. Firefighters contained the fire to one mobile home unit. No further details.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E107 E287 E296 E8 EM15 RA106 RA107 RA72 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire; INC#0423; 08:31AM; 20652 W Lassen St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3lqiWIG; Chatsworth; One story, single family dwelling with heavy fire and smoke showing. Firefighters are in the offensive mode.; FS 107; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E107 E287 E296 E8 EM15 RA106 RA107 RA72 T87 T96; CH9; 17; Margaret Stewart

Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0084; 01:38AM; 645 S Imperial St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3GO8gxL; #Downtown; PRELIM: First arriving 40 LAFD Firefighters took just 31 minutes (2:09 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish a contents fire deep within a secured and highly compartmentalized 100' x 100' one-story legal cannabis dispensary. No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AR1 BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E202 E203 E209 E210 E211 E27 E3 E4 E447 E458 E9 EA1 EM1 RA25 RA809 RA827 SQ21 T10 T11 T2 T3 T9 UR27; CH9; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#1030; 02:09PM; 19438 Lorne St; MAP: https://maps.app.goo.gl/DdTpY8YPqEUbaDJJ7; #Reseda; *Address / Community Name Corrected to 19438 Lorne Street in Reseda*. 32 LAFD Firefighters took just 25 minutes to access, confine and extinguish fire involving the patio and rear portion of a 1,936 square foot one-story home (built 1954). No injury. Fire cause under investigation.; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E296 E73 RA104 RA73 T73 T96; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1030; 01:44PM; 8043 N Tunney Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/2zFIY3f; #Winnetka; *Address Tentative*. Offensive fire attack against heavy smoke and fire to the rear of a one-story home. ; FS 104; Batt 17; Valley Bureau; Council District outside city; BC15 BC17 E103 E104 E273 E296 E73 RA104 RA73 T73 T96; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Update Traffic Collision; INC#1005; 02:20PM; SB 405 Fwy x Victory Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/48hlXBl; #VanNuys; Contrary to initial reports to CHP from multiple 9-1-1 callers, the vehicle is now best described as a full size commercial dump truck.; FS 39; Batt 10; Valley Bureau; Council District 6; BC15 E275 E288 E290 E39 E88 EM10 HR3 RA39 RA7 RA83 RA839 RA878 T75 T88 T90 UR88; CH8; 17; Brian Humphrey
